title: 'Keep Kamala and carry-on-la': Harris makes hilarious appearance on 'Saturday Night Live'; watch video
content: Kamala Harris made a surprise comedic appearance on 'Saturday Night Live' alongside Maya Rudolph, who portrayed her. In their exchange, they humorously discussed shared experiences and took jabs at Donald Trump. The duo, dressed identically, urged supporters to continue backing Harris while ending the segment with the classic 'SNL' sign-off.
summary: Kamala Harris made a surprise comedic appearance on 'Saturday Night Live' alongside Maya Rudolph, who portrayed her. In their exchange, they humorously discussed shared experiences and took jabs at Donald Trump. The duo, dressed identically, urged supporters to continue backing Harris while ending the segment with the classic 'SNL' sign-off.

title: 'Treated me like terrorist, drug dealer': Euthanised squirrel Peanut's owner says his house was ransacked for five hours
content: Mark Longo, owner of a pet squirrel named Peanut, reports a five-hour raid on his home by government agents, seizing his pets. Officials claim Peanut bit someone and must be tested for rabies, but Longo denies it, seeking further investigation. Peanut's rescue story and widespread social media fame highlight his significance to Longo's animal rescue organization.
summary: Mark Longo, owner of a pet squirrel named Peanut, reports a five-hour raid on his home by government agents, seizing his pets. Officials claim Peanut bit someone and must be tested for rabies, but Longo denies it, seeking further investigation. Peanut's rescue story and widespread social media fame highlight his significance to Longo's animal rescue organization.

title: Women of America v Donald Trump: Liberals triggered by MAGA leader's 'execution fantasy'
content: Arizona attorney general Kris Mayes is investigating whether Donald Trump's comments about Liz Cheney constitute a death threat. The controversial remarks have sparked significant outrage among Democratic women, with Kamala Harris condemning such rhetoric.
summary: Arizona attorney general Kris Mayes is investigating whether Donald Trump's comments about Liz Cheney constitute a death threat. The controversial remarks have sparked significant outrage among Democratic women, with Kamala Harris condemning such rhetoric.

title: ‘Made me who I am today’: Kamala Harris draws strength from mother's journey from India
content: Kamala Harris paid tribute to her mother, Dr Shyamala Gopalan Harris, an Indian immigrant who profoundly influenced her life and career. Harris reflected on her upbringing, her commitment to healthcare equity, her vision for immigration reform, and her foreign policy stance, contrasting it with her opponent's.
summary: Kamala Harris paid tribute to her mother, Dr Shyamala Gopalan Harris, an Indian immigrant who profoundly influenced her life and career. Harris reflected on her upbringing, her commitment to healthcare equity, her vision for immigration reform, and her foreign policy stance, contrasting it with her opponent's.

title: Dhaka-Washington ties won't be impacted by US polls: Yunus govt
Bar & grill chain TGI Fridays files for bankruptcy
content: Casual dining chain TGI Fridays has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in Texas. Its 39 company-owned US restaurants will stay open during the restructuring, while 56 US franchise locations and those in 40 other countries are unaffected. The pandemic and capital structure issues are cited as primary reasons for the filing.
summary: Casual dining chain TGI Fridays has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in Texas. Its 39 company-owned US restaurants will stay open during the restructuring, while 56 US franchise locations and those in 40 other countries are unaffected. The pandemic and capital structure issues are cited as primary reasons for the filing.

title: Ed Sheeran's 'Thinking Out Loud' prevails in copyright appeal over 'Let's Get It On'
content: A federal appeals court ruled that Ed Sheeran's 'Thinking Out Loud' did not violate the copyright of Marvin Gaye's 'Let's Get It On.' The court found that only the skeletal sheet music of 'Let's Get It On' was protected, rejecting claims about the song's chord pattern originality.
summary: A federal appeals court ruled that Ed Sheeran's 'Thinking Out Loud' did not violate the copyright of Marvin Gaye's 'Let's Get It On.' The court found that only the skeletal sheet music of 'Let's Get It On' was protected, rejecting claims about the song's chord pattern originality.

title: Iranian woman strips in protest over assault by security forces for improper hijab; arrested
content: A video of a woman walking in her undergarments at an Iranian university has gone viral, leading to her detention by security. Officials stated she was under mental distress, though some speculate it was a protest against mandatory hijab laws. The woman may be sent to a mental hospital following further investigation.
summary: A video of a woman walking in her undergarments at an Iranian university has gone viral, leading to her detention by security. Officials stated she was under mental distress, though some speculate it was a protest against mandatory hijab laws. The woman may be sent to a mental hospital following further investigation.

title: White House altered official transcript of Biden remarks on Trump and 'garbage'
Kamala Harris prepares for surprise cameo on 'Saturday Night Live' 3 days before US election
content: Democratic VP Kamala Harris is making a secretive cameo on Saturday Night Live this week, just days before the election. The episode, hosted by John Mulaney, will feature Sen. Tim Kaine and musical guest Chappell Roan. Harris's appearance aims to boost the Democrats' final push, adding significant political weight to the show.
summary: Democratic VP Kamala Harris is making a secretive cameo on Saturday Night Live this week, just days before the election. The episode, hosted by John Mulaney, will feature Sen. Tim Kaine and musical guest Chappell Roan. Harris's appearance aims to boost the Democrats' final push, adding significant political weight to the show.

title: Jason Kelce smashes fan's phone for attack on Travis, Taylor Swift: 'Who's the f***** now?'
content: Former Philadelphia Eagles Center Jason Kelce confronted a Penn State fan outside Beaver Studio who hurled a homophobic slur at his brother Travis. Jason smashed the man's phone in retaliation, sparking debate on social media about whether his reaction was justified. "This is exactly how trolls should be handled in real life. Kudos to Jason Kelce," a post said.
summary: Former Philadelphia Eagles Center Jason Kelce confronted a Penn State fan outside Beaver Studio who hurled a homophobic slur at his brother Travis. Jason smashed the man's phone in retaliation, sparking debate on social media about whether his reaction was justified. "This is exactly how trolls should be handled in real life. Kudos to Jason Kelce," a post said.

title: Harrison Ford endorses Kamala Harris: 'Never wanted to talk about it'
content: Talking about former president Donald Trump, Ford said, "The other guy, he demands unquestioning loyalty, says he wants revenge. I'm Harrison Ford. I've got one vote - same as anyone else - and I'm going to use it to move forward. I'm going to vote for Kamala Harris." Ford said he doesn't agree with everything Kamala Harris and Tim Walz stand for, they are not perfect. "These two people believe in the rule of law. They believe in science. They believe that when you govern, you do so for all Americans."
summary: Talking about former president Donald Trump, Ford said, "The other guy, he demands unquestioning loyalty, says he wants revenge. I'm Harrison Ford. I've got one vote - same as anyone else - and I'm going to use it to move forward. I'm going to vote for Kamala Harris." Ford said he doesn't agree with everything Kamala Harris and Tim Walz stand for, they are not perfect. "These two people believe in the rule of law. They believe in science. They believe that when you govern, you do so for all Americans."

title: Trump is anxious, asking aides more questions: 'Why women don't like me?'
content: Former President Donald Trump shows increasing anxiety as Election Day nears, frequently reaching out to aides for reassurance and questioning about their opinion on whether they think he will women. A CNN report said Donald Trump also asked his aides why women voters are less supportive to him as the gender division is clear this election: men are voting for Trump and women for Harris.
summary: Former President Donald Trump shows increasing anxiety as Election Day nears, frequently reaching out to aides for reassurance and questioning about their opinion on whether they think he will women. A CNN report said Donald Trump also asked his aides why women voters are less supportive to him as the gender division is clear this election: men are voting for Trump and women for Harris.

title: Elon Musk, RFK Jr react to euthanization of P'Nut the Squirrel: 'Are these the same guys...'
content: Peanut the Squirrel, a social media star, was seized by the New York government and then euthanized triggering major outrage on social media, especially from GOP leaders -- two days before the election. "The government should leave people and their animals alone," Elon Musk wrote on X commenting on the report of how seven-year-old Peanut was seized and then killed.
summary: Peanut the Squirrel, a social media star, was seized by the New York government and then euthanized triggering major outrage on social media, especially from GOP leaders -- two days before the election. "The government should leave people and their animals alone," Elon Musk wrote on X commenting on the report of how seven-year-old Peanut was seized and then killed.

title: US Election 2024: Polling date, time, coverage, and streaming options; know all about it
content: As the 2024 US presidential election approaches, Kamala Harris and Donald Trump ramp up campaigns in key battleground states. The election is set for November 5, 2024, with results potentially taking days if the race is close. Key swing states and the possibility of an electoral tie remain crucial factors in determining the outcome.
summary: As the 2024 US presidential election approaches, Kamala Harris and Donald Trump ramp up campaigns in key battleground states. The election is set for November 5, 2024, with results potentially taking days if the race is close. Key swing states and the possibility of an electoral tie remain crucial factors in determining the outcome.

title: 'I am married to a strong woman': Donald Trump says Mark Cuban is very insecure
content: ​​Trump said the list of strong and intelligent women around him is long and he mentioned that he happens to be married to a rather strong woman Melania, who just had a No.1 bestseller book in the whole world. "I have given women chances too. Kellyanne was the head of my 2016 victory. Susie Wiles is strong...I have tremendously strong women," Trump said.
summary: ​​Trump said the list of strong and intelligent women around him is long and he mentioned that he happens to be married to a rather strong woman Melania, who just had a No.1 bestseller book in the whole world. "I have given women chances too. Kellyanne was the head of my 2016 victory. Susie Wiles is strong...I have tremendously strong women," Trump said.

title: MAGA meltdown over Indians stealing jobs as racial abuse mounts
content: Recent Bureau of Labor Statistics data highlighted that while native-born Americans lost 773,000 jobs over the past year, foreign-born workers gained 1 million jobs. MAGA media and pro-Trump economists allege this supports the 'great replacement theory,' blaming immigrants for job losses. The debate stirs online resentment towards Indian tech workers, despite some defending their contributions.
summary: Recent Bureau of Labor Statistics data highlighted that while native-born Americans lost 773,000 jobs over the past year, foreign-born workers gained 1 million jobs. MAGA media and pro-Trump economists allege this supports the 'great replacement theory,' blaming immigrants for job losses. The debate stirs online resentment towards Indian tech workers, despite some defending their contributions.

title: Tulsi Gabbard speaks up on 'intelligent woman' row; roasts both Mark Cuban, Liz Cheney
content: In a statement, Tulsi Gabbard roasted both Mark Cuban and Kamala Harris supporter Liz Cheney as she said the premise of Mark Cuban's recent comment is that Liz Cheney -- since she is supporting Kamala Harris -- is a strong woman. "But the reality is they are hypocritical cowers because as @realDonaldTrump pointed out, they are eager to send our troops into war, but they would never volunteer to put their own lives on the line for such military adventures. That’s not strength. That’s hypocrisy and cowardice."
summary: In a statement, Tulsi Gabbard roasted both Mark Cuban and Kamala Harris supporter Liz Cheney as she said the premise of Mark Cuban's recent comment is that Liz Cheney -- since she is supporting Kamala Harris -- is a strong woman. "But the reality is they are hypocritical cowers because as @realDonaldTrump pointed out, they are eager to send our troops into war, but they would never volunteer to put their own lives on the line for such military adventures. That’s not strength. That’s hypocrisy and cowardice."

title: Diddy tape: Donald Trump's son says all celebs like JLo, Beyonce have a price
content: "We know about Epstein, Harvey Weinstein, We know about Diddy's parties..." Benny Johnson said. "Three Democrats...All of them are Democrats," Eric added. "Mega donors," Johnson said. "Diddy tape must be tough," Johnson said naming Eminem, Usher. Jennifer Lopez endorsed Kamala Harris after comedian Tony Hinchcliffe called Puerto Rico an island of garbage -- at Trump's MSG event. As a Puerto Rican, JLo took offence and endorsed Kamala Harris to which MAGA supporters reminded her that she was the ex-girlfriend of Diddy.

"Diddy tape must be tough," Johnson said naming Eminem, Usher. Jennifer Lopez endorsed Kamala Harris after comedian Tony Hinchcliffe called Puerto Rico an island of garbage -- at Trump's MSG event. As a Puerto Rican, JLo took offence and endorsed Kamala Harris to which MAGA supporters reminded her that she was the ex-girlfriend of Diddy.

title: Archaeologists uncover 11 sealed burials in ancient Egyptian Tomb at Luxor
content: Archaeologists from Egypt and the US discovered 11 sealed burials from the Middle Kingdom near Luxor, including coffins of men, women, and children. Significant findings include an amethyst necklace and ancient mirrors. This aligns with Egypt's efforts to revive tourism, showcasing its historical treasures amid economic challenges. The Grand Egyptian Museum also unveiled new exhibition halls recently.
summary: Archaeologists from Egypt and the US discovered 11 sealed burials from the Middle Kingdom near Luxor, including coffins of men, women, and children. Significant findings include an amethyst necklace and ancient mirrors. This aligns with Egypt's efforts to revive tourism, showcasing its historical treasures amid economic challenges. The Grand Egyptian Museum also unveiled new exhibition halls recently.
